metadata.synopsis: Wulbren is the leader of the Ironhand Gnomes. He is currently imprisoned in moonrise towers. He has the lazy charm of arrogant and the determination and cunning of the leader of a revolution. In this dialogue he offers you the main quest - to free him and the tieflings from the prison. He can speak to you through the bars - either with the player in prison, OR with the player speaking to them from the outside. NOTE: Wulbren pushes hard to charm the player and make them think they're friends. He keeps the friendly and charming mask on tight (dropping it only when he insults the player). We can have the lightest touch of menace in this dialogue, a hint that he's holding something back or that there is more to this than it seems, but it should be a light touch. He is friendly and charming here (the mask will drop back at Haven when he is rescued).
metadata.how_to_trigger: the gnomes are always in the prison in moonrise towers

14.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
14.text: Hey! We're dead if you don't help, all right? Either throw me something to crack open the back wall, or get these damn doors open. Hurry!
14.context: NodeContext: hates player but has no choice - frantic and a little panicked

20.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
20.text: Your friend is some smooth talker to shut a guard down like that. What do you lot want with me, exactly?
20.context: NodeContext: impressed but suspicious - trying to figure out the player's motives

23.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
23.text: Your mate spooked the guards - we can't afford another slip up, not with the eyes of the Absolute everywhere.
23.context: NodeContext: furtive - speaking low. Player was spotted by guards, if it happens again they're done for

25.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
25.text: ...A minor hiccup in our escape plan, I see.
25.context: NodeContext: thinks the player is an idiot but is trying not to show it

57.speaker: Player

64.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
64.text: Didn't doubt you for a moment, friend.
64.context: NodeContext: absolutely did but he's trying ot be nice

46.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
46.text: Cast your eyes to the back - see that hole yonder? I'd bet my last copper that's your ticket out.

190.text: I'd scamper sharpish - I've seen what the Warden does to the insubordinate. Leave, before she catches you.

245.speaker: Player

8.context: NodeContext: Furious. "Gaerdal" = GAIR-dul. Gaerdal is a deity, so expressed like "God help me."

188.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
188.text: We need to get out of here or we're stone dead. Get us tools, anything that could crack the wall behind us.
188.context: NodeContext: panicked - desperately trying to sway player

239.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
239.text: Or find a way to get this damn door open. Hurry!
239.context: NodeContext: panicked - desperately trying to sway player

169.speaker: Player
169.text: I have something that can break stone.
169.context: NodeContext: trying not to sound to frustrated that the job isn't done - wants player to hurry

162.speaker: Player
162.text: Got it - I'll be back soon.
162.context: NodeContext: trying not to sound to frustrated that the job isn't done - wants player to hurry

10.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
10.context: NodeContext: trying not to sound to frustrated that the job isn't done - wants player to hurry

221.speaker: Player
221.text: I don't have time for this. You're on your own.

217.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
217.text: Enjoy being in the Absolute's pocket. I'm sure it's nice and cosy.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Stop whining - at least I'm fighting back against the Absolute.

125.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
125.text: At what cost? Do we deserve the knife for your folly?

215.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
215.text: About time - any luck with those tools?
215.context: NodeContext: a little frantic, violence is happening around you - trying to keep your cool

160.speaker: Player
160.text: I might have something that could help.
160.context: NodeContext: full of hate and violence

109.speaker: Player
109.text: I don't have time for this. You're on your own.
109.context: NodeContext: full of hate and violence

242.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
242.text: You've killed us, you prick of the absolute - stone dead.
242.context: NodeContext: full of hate and violence

225.speaker: Player
225.text: Not yet, I'll be back soon.

216.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
216.text: I should've taken charge of that damn boat - we'd be out of here by now.
216.context: NodeContext: tense and annoyed - just wants to leave

220.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
220.text: We're short on time, friend. Any luck with those tools?
220.context: NodeContext: glad to see player but also knows he's short on time - they need tools and need them now

251.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
251.context: NodeContext: furtive - speaking low. Player was spotted by guards, if it happens again they're done for
